price: Na (Farao ne nenkorͻfoͻ) wͻ (awudisεm ho) bͻne bi tia me, enti mesuro sε wͻbɛku me” .
arabic: وَلَهُمۡ عَلَيَّ ذَنۢبٞ فَأَخَافُ أَن يَقۡتُلُونِ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: walahum ʿalayya dhanbun fa-akhāfu an yaqtulūni
